extendedInfo.description: Escape from LaVille will amaze you with challenging riddles and puzzles! You are the detective Forest Campbell, a member of the W.E.S.T. (Weird Enigma Special Team) which is seeking for the truth about LaVille district. Solving the puzzles you will discover the dark and intriguing history of this cursed district. Collecting the articles of the local newspaper you will get an important perspective for your investigation: the LaVille inhabitants point of view. â®â®â®â®â®â®â®â®â® â®â Plot ââ® 2011, something strange happened to LaVille district.  A mysterious virus hit the inhabitants who got sick and started to die, one by one.  The weirdest thing is that after death their bodies areâ¦ back to life!  Forest Campbell is engaged to solve the mystery behind the district but when he arrives he find himself surrounded by death. The investigation leads him into an old mansion that seems to be the key to the mysteryâ¦ â®â®â®â®â®â®â®â®â® â®â Features ââ® â Lots of puzzles to solve! â Awesome locations to explore! â Dozens of items to solve the riddles! â Beautiful dark soundtrack to delight your gaming! â Outstanding graphics to taste! â Several newspaper articles to collect and read! â Immersive storyline to keep yourself into the game! â¤ Website: www.destinyglovestudio.com â¤ Twitter: @destinyglove â¤ Youtube Trailer: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Oqdmp-R8Gxg

reviews.title: Puzzles are slightly complicated
reviews.comment: Some of the puzzles in this game are a little complicated because the clues given don\'t seem to relate to the puzzle, besides that it\'s a great game. There are a lot of spelling errors in the game which removes from the authenticity and professionalism. Fix that and it\'s a cool game!
reviews.author: Katherine Gomez

reviews.title: Pants
reviews.comment: This game was rubbish.  Totally obscure puzzles. Totally meaningless storyline. The language used made no sense, clearly not checked by anyone who actually speaks proper English. And I was not sure I had reached the end of the game when I had! Also way too short. Waste of money.
reviews.author: Sarah W

reviews.title: loved it...
reviews.comment: what a great little game ...more pls
reviews.author: Carol Barlow

reviews.comment: Takes several seconds to move between rooms, very annoying. The logic behind many puzzles is nonexistent
reviews.author: Dave Schnizlein

reviews.title: Well done
reviews.comment: Enjoyed this very much. A little different from what I usually play but kept me occupied for a while. Not too hard, nor too simple. Some grammar and spelling issues but not enough to cause confusion. Please continue the series... :)
reviews.author: Ankha Pritchard

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: loved this game, cant wait for the next one x
reviews.author: Gemma Hargreaves

reviews.title: Hi
reviews.comment: This game suck balls cant play the game at all cant even open it
reviews.author: Beth Hardin

reviews.title: Enjoyed it
reviews.comment: But it was not long enough.
reviews.author: Eunice Gering

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Despite anything anyone else said, i loved this game. Wonderful puzzles. Will download next chapter!!
reviews.author: Christine Ruschmeier

reviews.title: Was OK
reviews.comment: Very short game all I can say was OK !
reviews.author: Tracy Jones
